department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
full_summary:
# F2402-220146 Portable Marine Biochemistry Laboratory

### Tender Details

### Language
This request for proposal (RFP) is for the manufacture, supply, delivery and offloading of one (1) portable marine biochemistry laboratory.

### Contract Details

*   **Tender Reference Number:** WS3705751167-Doc3705768441
*   **Amendment Number:** 14
*   **Publication Date:** January 23, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date:** June 28, 2023 at 14:00 EDT
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** November 10, 2023
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2024

### Requirements

The Canadian Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) requires the manufacture, supply, delivery and offloading of a portable marine biochemistry laboratory, including the final architectural drawing/blueprint, to their location in Winnipeg, Manitoba, Canada.

### Evaluation Criteria

Proposals will be evaluated on the basis of **Lowest Price**.

### Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

*   **Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)**
*   **Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)**
*   **Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement**
*   **Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)**
*   **Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement**
*   **Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)**
*   **Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement**

### Contracting Entity

*   **Contracting Entity Name:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **Contracting Entity Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada

### Contact Information

To obtain more information, please contact:
Diane Warnell, SPAC/PSPC\\ diane.warnell@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca\\ \\ *Note: All required supporting documentation must be submitted by June 28, 2023, at 14:00 ET. Any bids submitted after this date and time will be declared non-responsive.*\\
